channel.title: (Help) Server Item ID's In Client Folder?
channel.description:
Hello there! i would like to ask kindly what the specific file is called so i can locate the item id's in the client folder :)
im tired of going around the internet finding the specific item for a 317 server, meanwhile i can just check the client file.
please and thank you

item.title: (Help) Server Item ID's In Client Folder?
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

What? Are you talking about dumping the items into a text file?
Well you have to create that file. But luckily your client probably has a method of dumping their items (Class8, ItemDef, ItemData, etc). Look for it.

What’s wrong with the item config file server sided? Why not copy and paste it into your client? (lol)

Read full topic
item.source: (Help) Server Item ID's In Client Folder?
